vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.4.2;
son of: Rimmon (H7417B);
brother of: Rechab (H7394)
§ Baana or Baanah = "in affliction"
1) a Benjamite, son Rimmon, who with his brother Rechab murdered Ish-bosheth. For this, killed by David, mutilated bodies hung up over the pool at Hebron
2) a Netophathite, father of Heleb or Heled, one of David's mighty warriors
3) the head of a family of exiles returning with Zerubbabel
4) a chief of the people
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Rimón; asesino del rey Is-bóset; (b)   padre de Héled, guerrero; en tiempos del rey David; (c)   hombre; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
巴拿 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "憂傷痛苦"
1) 便雅憫支派人臨門的兒子, 他和其兄弟利甲謀殺了伊施波設. 大衛王因而將他們兩處死並分屍, 將肢體懸於希伯崙的池邊示眾.(撒下 4)
2) 尼陀法人希立的父親, 希立是大衛王的大能勇士之一 (撒下 23:29;代上 11:30)
3) 與所羅巴伯一同回歸的被逐的一個家族的首領 (拉 2:2;尼 7:7)
4) 一位民的領袖(尼 10:27)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
巴拿 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "忧伤痛苦"
1) 便雅悯支派人临门的儿子, 他和其兄弟利甲谋杀了伊施波设. 大卫王因而将他们两处死并分尸, 将肢体悬于希伯仑的池边示众.(撒下 4)
2) 尼陀法人希立的父亲, 希立是大卫王的大能勇士之一 (撒下 23:29;代上 11:30)
3) 与所罗巴伯一同回归的被逐的一个家族的首领 (拉 2:2;尼 7:7)
4) 一位民的领袖(尼 10:27)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.23.29;
father of: Heleb (H2460)
§ Baana or Baanah = "in affliction"
1) a Benjamite, son Rimmon, who with his brother Rechab murdered Ish-bosheth. For this, killed by David, mutilated bodies hung up over the pool at Hebron
2) a Netophathite, father of Heleb or Heled, one of David's mighty warriors
3) the head of a family of exiles returning with Zerubbabel
4) a chief of the people

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.2
§ Baana or Baanah = "in affliction"
1) a Benjamite, son Rimmon, who with his brother Rechab murdered Ish-bosheth. For this, killed by David, mutilated bodies hung up over the pool at Hebron
2) a Netophathite, father of Heleb or Heled, one of David's mighty warriors
3) the head of a family of exiles returning with Zerubbabel
4) a chief of the people

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.10.27
§ Baana or Baanah = "in affliction"
1) a Benjamite, son Rimmon, who with his brother Rechab murdered Ish-bosheth. For this, killed by David, mutilated bodies hung up over the pool at Hebron
2) a Netophathite, father of Heleb or Heled, one of David's mighty warriors
3) the head of a family of exiles returning with Zerubbabel
4) a chief of the people
